title: schema for idmanagement.gov policy matrix
description: A document representing a law, a government policy, or a technical standard.

shortName.description: The short name of the document

longName.description: The full name of the document

externalURL.description: A URL where the original document can be found

description.description: A long description of the document, can be multiline

scope.description: The scope of the document, can be 'Worforce Identity', if primarily for government personnel, or 'Public Identity' if primarily for citizens.

ficam-services.description: The FICAM services this document relates to, if any.
